name: Energy Mastery
description: You can project energy from evocation magic items.
prerequisites: Use Magic Device 1 rank, base Fortitude save bonus +4
benefit: You can cause an item that has a 1st level or higher evocation spell with the acid, cold, electricity, or fire descriptor in its construction requirements to cast burning hands. The spell has the energy descriptor from the appropriate requirement spell and deals that type of damage instead of fire damage. You can use this feat once per day, plus an additional time per day at base Fortitude save bonus +6, +8, +10, and +12.
